channel.title: Adding Doors
channel.description: I have done it in other servers...I think, but I just can't add doors to mine. It is getting annoying, here is my code in objectmanager (source) [code]//Dungeoneering Start c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1762, 2463, 4783, 1, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(194, 2423, 3525, 0, 10); //Dungeoneering Rock c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(16081, 1879, 4620, 0, 10); //Dungeoneering lvl 1 tele c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2014, 1859, 4621, 0, 10); //Dungeoneering Money c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(16078, 1869, 4622, 0, 10); //Dungeoneering Rope c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2930, 2383, 4714, 3, 10); //Dungeoneering Boss 1 door c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1032, 2382, 4714, 1, 10); //warning sign FunPk c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(79, 3044, 5105, 1, 10); //dungie blocker c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(10778, 2867, 9530, 1, 10); //dung floor 4 portal c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(7272, 3233, 9316, 1, 10); //dung floor 5 portal c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4408, 2869, 9949, 1, 10); //dung floor 6 portalEND c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(410, 1860, 4625, 1, 10); //dung floor 6 portalEND c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(6552, 1859, 4617, 1, 10); //dung floor 6 portalEND c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 1919, 4640, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 3048, 5233, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 2980, 5111, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 2867, 9527, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 3234, 9327, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 2387, 4721, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 2429, 4680, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 2790, 9328, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 3060, 5209, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 3229, 9312, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 2864, 9950, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1909, 4644, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1908, 4647, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1900, 4650, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1894, 4651, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1898, 4646, 0,10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1898, 4632, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1902, 4628, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1909, 4631, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1909, 4634, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1894, 4628, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2383, 4714, 1, 10);//REMOVE Ancient Gate| Dungeoneering c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2382, 4714, 1, 10);//REMOVE Danger Sign| Dungeoneering[/code] That is for my coding, for doors, ladders, and such. All of the rest, *removing doors*, making ladders, and all of the other stuff supposedly works, but the friggin doors just won't go in D: haha, i have had many other people look at it, and they said it should work, but, it doesn't. (of course). If anyone would be willing to help that would be great.

item.title: Adding Doors
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Its because doors are not the tile type 10… try using like 1, 2, 3, or 4…

Read full topic

@stooks wrote:

i had the same problem, try to click on the object, and move around it a little. tell me if it worked, and ill help you through this.

item.title: Adding Doors
item.dc:creator: @stooks stooks
item.description:
@stooks wrote:

I have done it in other servers…I think, but I just can’t add doors to mine. It is getting annoying, here is my code in objectmanager (source)

//Dungeoneering Start c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1762, 2463, 4783, 1, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(194, 2423, 3525, 0, 10); //Dungeoneering Rock c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(16081, 1879, 4620, 0, 10); //Dungeoneering lvl 1 tele c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2014, 1859, 4621, 0, 10); //Dungeoneering Money c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(16078, 1869, 4622, 0, 10); //Dungeoneering Rope c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2930, 2383, 4714, 3, 10); //Dungeoneering Boss 1 door c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1032, 2382, 4714, 1, 10); //warning sign FunPk c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(79, 3044, 5105, 1, 10); //dungie blocker c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(10778, 2867, 9530, 1, 10); //dung floor 4 portal c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(7272, 3233, 9316, 1, 10); //dung floor 5 portal c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4408, 2869, 9949, 1, 10); //dung floor 6 portalEND c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(410, 1860, 4625, 1, 10); //dung floor 6 portalEND c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(6552, 1859, 4617, 1, 10); //dung floor 6 portalEND c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 1919, 4640, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 3048, 5233, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 2980, 5111, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 2867, 9527, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 3234, 9327, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 2387, 4721, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 2429, 4680, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 2790, 9328, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 3060, 5209, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 3229, 9312, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1747, 2864, 9950, 0, 10); //escape ladder c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1909, 4644, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1908, 4647, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1900, 4650, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1894, 4651, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1898, 4646, 0,10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1898, 4632, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1902, 4628, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1909, 4631, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1909, 4634, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1601, 1894, 4628, 0, 10); //dungeoneering doors c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2383, 4714, 1, 10);//REMOVE Ancient Gate| Dungeoneering c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2382, 4714, 1, 10);//REMOVE Danger Sign| Dungeoneering
That is for my coding, for doors, ladders, and such. All of the rest, removing doors, making ladders, and all of the other stuff supposedly works, but the friggin doors just won’t go in D: haha, i have had many other people look at it, and they said it should work, but, it doesn’t. (of course). If anyone would be willing to help that would be great.
